Bash(python -c "
import mdtraj as md
import numpy as np

# Load a test trajectory to understand format
print(''Testing MDTraj anchor_molecules format...'')

# First check what topology.select returns
traj = md.load(''repeat1.dcd'', top=''system.pdb'')
print(''Loaded trajectory successfully'')

chain_atoms = traj.topology.select(''protein and chainid 0'')
print(''Chain atoms type:'', type(chain_atoms))
print(''Chain atoms shape:'', chain_atoms.shape)
print(''First few atoms:'', chain_atoms[:5])

# Test what anchor_molecules expects
print(''\nTesting formats:'')
print(''1. Raw numpy array:'', type(chain_atoms))

# Test if we should use the arrays directly
try:
    # Try with just one anchor molecule
    test_anchors = [chain_atoms[:10]]  # First 10 atoms as test
    print(''2. List with numpy array:'', type(test_anchors[0]))
    print(''   Content:'', test_anchors[0])
except Exception as e:
    print(''2. Error with list format:'', e)
")

Bash(python -c "
import mdtraj as md

traj = md.load(''repeat1.dcd'', top=''system.pdb'')
print(''Topology info:'')
print(f''Chains: {traj.topology.n_chains}'')
print(f''Residues: {traj.topology.n_residues}'') 
print(f''Atoms: {traj.topology.n_atoms}'')

print(''\nChain information:'')
for i, chain in enumerate(traj.topology.chains):
    print(f''Chain {i}: index={chain.index}, n_residues={chain.n_residues}'')
    
print(''\nTesting chain selections:'')
for i in range(min(3, traj.topology.n_chains)):
    selection = f''protein and chainid {i}''
    atoms = traj.topology.select(selection)
    print(f''chainid {i}: {len(atoms)} atoms'')
    
    selection2 = f''chainid {i}''
    atoms2 = traj.topology.select(selection2)
    print(f''chainid {i} (all): {len(atoms2)} atoms'')

print(''\nTesting protein selection:'')
protein_atoms = traj.topology.select(''protein'')
print(f''All protein: {len(protein_atoms)} atoms'')
")

Bash(python -c "
import mdtraj as md

traj = md.load(''repeat1.dcd'', top=''system.pdb'')

print(''Checking which chains contain protein:'')
for i in range(traj.topology.n_chains):
    selection = f''protein and chainid {i}''
    atoms = traj.topology.select(selection)
    if len(atoms) > 0:
        print(f''Chain {i}: {len(atoms)} protein atoms'')
        
        # Sample some residues from this chain
        protein_residues = [r for r in traj.topology.chain(i).residues if r.is_protein]
        print(f''  First few residues: {[r.name for r in protein_residues[:5]]}'')
        
        # Check if this might be chain P
        break

print(''\nChecking ligand:'')
from prism.utils.ligand import identify_ligand_residue
ligand = identify_ligand_residue(traj)
if ligand:
    print(f''Found ligand: {ligand.name} in chain {ligand.chain.index}'')
    ligand_atoms = traj.topology.select(f''resname {ligand.name}'')
    print(f''Ligand atoms: {len(ligand_atoms)}'')
else:
    print(''No ligand found'')
")

Bash(python -c "
import mdtraj as md

traj = md.load(''repeat1_processed.xtc'', top=''system.pdb'', frame_slice=slice(0, 1))
print(''System topology analysis:'')
print(f''Total chains: {traj.topology.n_chains}'')

print(''\nChain information:'')
for i, chain in enumerate(traj.topology.chains):
    protein_atoms = traj.topology.select(f''protein and chainid {i}'')
    if len(protein_atoms) > 0:
        ca_atoms = traj.topology.select(f''protein and chainid {i} and name CA'')
        print(f''Chain {i}: {len(protein_atoms)} protein atoms, {len(ca_atoms)} CA atoms'')
        
        # Get first few residue names
        residues = [r for r in chain.residues if r.is_protein]
        if residues:
            res_names = [r.name for r in residues[:5]]
            print(f''  First residues: {res_names}'')
    else:
        # Check for ligand
        non_protein = [r for r in chain.residues if not r.is_protein and r.name not in [''WAT'', ''HOH'', ''NA'', ''CL'']]
        if non_protein:
            print(f''Chain {i}: Contains non-protein: {[r.name for r in non_protein]}'')

# Check ligand
from prism.utils.ligand import identify_ligand_residue
ligand = identify_ligand_residue(traj)
if ligand:
    print(f''\nLigand found: {ligand.name} in chain {ligand.chain.index}'')
    ligand_atoms = traj.topology.select(f''resname {ligand.name}'')
    print(f''Ligand atoms: {len(ligand_atoms)}'')
")

Bash(python3 -c "
import mdtraj as md
import numpy as np

print(''✓ mdtraj imported successfully'')

# Check available analysis functions
analysis_functions = [
    ''compute_distances'', ''compute_contacts'', ''rmsd'', ''rmsf'', 
    ''compute_dihedrals'', ''compute_angles'', ''superpose''
]

for func in analysis_functions:
    if hasattr(md, func):
        print(f''✓ md.{func}: available'')
    else:
        print(f''✗ md.{func}: NOT available'')

# Test trajectory loading
try:
    traj = md.load(''../data/repeat1_processed.xtc'', top=''../data/system.pdb'')
    print(f''✓ Full trajectory: {traj.n_frames} frames, {traj.n_atoms} atoms'')
    
    # Test slicing
    traj_slice = traj[::10]  # Every 10th frame
    print(f''✓ Frame slicing: {traj_slice.n_frames} frames (every 10th)'')
    
    print(f''✓ Topology info: {traj.topology.n_residues} residues, {traj.topology.n_chains} chains'')
    
except Exception as e:
    print(f''✗ Trajectory operations failed: {e}'')
")
